photos.title: YOU'RE A HUMAN
photos.description: So always remember, You're a human, not a designer. Don't get too high on yourself.

photos.title: Victory or Death
photos.description: Victory or Death is a battle cry not for the weak of heart nor mind. When setting out to accomplish your dreams or goals, expect nothing less than victory from yourself or die trying!

photos.title: Aquatic Octopus
photos.description: A portion of the proceeds from every sale of this design will go towards a fund that will benefit communities in countries around the world that are in need of clean water.

photos.title: 20k Leagues Under The Sea
photos.description: Inspired by 20k Leagues Under the Sea and printed using discharge and water based ink onto a 100% cotton indigo blue combed cotton tee. Nature's creative power is far beyond man's instinct of destruction.

photos.title: Mountain Circle Lieutenant
photos.description: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts. - Eleanor Roosevelt
